document_data.caption: Daggerdale, with the Tethyamar Trail shown.
document_data.name: Tethyamar Trail
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tethyamar Trail''' was a trade road that ran the length of [[Daggerdale]]. Locally, it was often referred to as '''the Daggerdale road'''.{{Cite dragon/294/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: The Leaning Tree|70}}

Geographical features.Dagger River: A river that eventually fed into the larger [[River Ashaba]] in [[Shadowdale]].

Inns and taverns.Teshford Arms: An inn just outside Dagger Falls.

Settlements.Anathar's Dell: Just southwest of a red-topped crag halfway between the northern tip of the Spiderhaunt Woods and Serpentsbridge.
Settlements.Dagger Falls: Just before the trail crossed the River Tesh.

document_data.History: Before [[human]]s settled in Dagger Falls, the [[dwarves]] of [[Tethyamar]] used the Tethyamar Trail to ship metals between their southern and northern holdings.{{Cite dungeon/192/Backdrop: Daggerdale|5}}
